feed.title: Rallly Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed?

Added a fallback to the given_name field when parsing profiles from identity providers.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.5.0...v3.5.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 🎨 Updated layout by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/976
  • 💄 Add form validation feedback by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/998
  • 🐛 Listen on all interfaces when running in docker by @kolaente in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1015
  • ✨ Add plain text version for each email by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1005
  • 💄 Update input and focus styles by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1012
  • ⚙️ Allow user to customize the sender name for mails by @bmaster001 in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1023

New Contributors

  • @kolaente made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1015
  • @bmaster001 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1023

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.5.0...v3.6.0

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed an issue that caused redirect to login to fail when accessing the polls page.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ✨ Use only geographic time zones by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1033
  • 🐛 Fix timezone form input by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1043
  • ⚡️ Quicker UI updates when adding participant by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1045
  • 🐛 Fix check for missing token on initial render by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1054
  • 🐛 Fix issue where verification links would automatically get consumed by link checkers by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1060

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.6.1...v3.7.0

entry.title: New release for Rallly: v3.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 🐛 Remove specific ciphers in tls config by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1065
  • ♻️ Switch to using new startTime column by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1041
  • ⚡️ Send finalization emails asynchronously by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1095
  • ✨ Show duration by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1098
  • ✨ Use dialogs to finalize and duplicate polls by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1099
  • ♻️ Improvements to adding/changing participant by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1108
  • ✨ Add option to delete account by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1110
  • ♻️ Remove legacy start column by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1113
  • 🐛 Fix update options bug by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1116
  • 🐛 Fix dynamic server usage error by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1117
  • 💄 Update styles for desktop poll by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1144
  • 🔒️ Remove link to change email by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1156
  • 🔒️ Hide link to login from registration by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1158
  • 🔒 Registration form hardening by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1160
  • ✨ New and Improved Screens by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1151
  • ✨ Improved time picker logic by @lukevella in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1166

New Contributors

  • @ArthurTeslyk made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1082
  • @dahlo made their first contribution in https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/pull/1132

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lukevella/rallly/compare/v3.7.0...v3.8.0
